SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Advertisement
The Advertisement class represents an advertisement with an ID, title, description, and media file.
AdvertisementPanel
The AdvertisementPanel class displays advertisements and train information.
AnalogClockPanel
The AnalogClockPanel class is a custom Swing panel that displays an analog clock.
Database
This class handles the connection to the PostgreSQL database.
MainDisplay
MainDisplay class represents the main frame of the application, which includes panels for advertisements, train information, news ticker, and weather information.
MapPanel
The MapPanel class displays a map with train locations.
MyApp3
Main application class for Subway Screen 3.
NewsTickerPanel
The NewsTickerPanel class creates a panel that fetches and displays news headlines in a scrolling ticker format.
Station
The Station class represents a train station with various attributes such as row, line code, station number, station code, station name, coordinates, common stations, and information about whether it is a current train location and which train is at the station.
SubwayMapPanel
 
SVGHelper
The SVGHelper class provides utility methods for loading and converting SVG files to BufferedImage objects.
Train
The Train class represents a train with an ID, direction, and station.
TrainLocation
The TrainLocation class represents the location of a train with an ID, coordinates, and a flag indicating whether it is the current train.
TrainLocationTest
 
TrainMap
The TrainMap class represents a map of trains and their associated stations.
TrainMapParser
The TrainMapParser class is responsible for parsing a CSV file containing station information and creating a map of stations.
TrainPanel
TrainPanel displays train information and updates train positions on a map.
TrainSelectionDialog
The TrainSelectionDialog class provides a dialog for selecting a train from a list of train numbers.
WeatherPanel
The WeatherPanel class provides methods to fetch and format weather reports for a given location.
